messages.content:
Categorize this IT Ticket:

add to thursday pm tau thursday pm tau la la care speaker shakespeare school loc la grand si cine si care tine cum la tau cum emotional registration la la si care si constructive la shakespeare school care ne va si cum cum si la maximum la copy paste browser ne re ore moderator tv show ii speaker copyright rights reserved ca mea date mailing sect add book want change how receive these update preferences

I'm leaning toward eliminating some options as clearly less fitting, narrowing down my decision.
